Name: Dark Prospect
About the game: The gates to hell have been opened and a flood of monsters arises, which are commanded by a powerful being, the overlord Play as soldier (FPS) It is up to you brave soldiers to protect the only weapon that can close the portals and save humanity - the Plasma Cannon. Build a defense Gather resources Craft weapons and gadgets Prepare for battle against the overlord (either controlled by player or an AI). Play as Overlord (RTS): These insignificant soldiers are trying to stop you, what a foolish undertaking. Your creatures all have special abilities Cast powerful spells The human world grants you souls with which you can make your monsters even stronger Control the action from the RTS perspective Key Features FPS: Gather resources, build a base, build weapons and gadgets, survive the attacks and destroy the RTS portals RTS: Build monsters, assemble squads, cast spells, extend the monsters abilitys, destroy the soldiers base 5 different maps with unique settings RTS can either be controlled by a player or an AI (Different AI difficulties) FPS team can be filled with bots Host or join a game via Steam Ingame communication: Voice chat / quick chat / chat
